Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teachers tend to beat around the bush when it comes to giving feedback, however genAi is more straight to the point, but can be unreliable.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Hearing feedback from another human can feel a little embarrassing, and they may personally judge my work. GenAi only knows right and wrong so it feels less personal

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAi is less accurate with feedback in terms of how the assessment is tailored, whereas the teacher understands the assignment.
